title: Full-Stack Web Applications Developer (WordPress / PHP)
description:
**Experience** 
 : 3\\.00 \\+ years
   

  

**Salary** 
 : Confidential (based on experience)
   

  

**Expected Notice Period** 
 : 15 Days
   

  

**Shift** 
 : (GMT\\-05:00\\) America/Chicago (CDT)
   

  

**Opportunity Type** 
 : Remote
   

  

**Placement Type** 
 : Full Time Permanent position(Payroll and Compliance to be managed by: Uplers)
   

  

**(\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client \\- IT Services and IT Consulting)
   

  

**What do you need for this opportunity?
   

  

**Must have skills required:**
 CI CD, Cloud Hosting, Docker, HTML / CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Kubernetes, MySQL, PHP, RESTAPI, version control, Wordpress
   

  

**IT Services and IT Consulting is Looking for:******
**Full\\-Stack Web Applications Developer (WordPress / PHP)**
**Long term Contract Opportunity**
**Job Summary**
 The Full\\-Stack Web Applications Developer will build, customize, and maintain high\\-performance, secure WordPress\\-based web applications and sites for our customers. The role focuses on creating clean, well\\-documented code, developing and customizing themes and plugins, and ensuring reliable, high\\-quality user experiences aligned with our security\\-first, fully managed hosting environment.
   

  

**Primary Responsibilities**
* Develop, customize, and maintain WordPress websites using Avada, Divi, and custom themes, ensuring responsive, high\\-performance front\\-end experiences.
* Design, develop, and maintain custom WordPress plugins and themes using PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, and jQuery, following best practices and coding standards.
* Write clean, well\\-structured, and well\\-documented code, including inline documentation and technical documentation for features and changes.
* Collaborate with internal teams (support, project management, and other developers) to implement new features, troubleshoot issues, and improve existing solutions.
* Optimize websites and web applications for performance, security, and scalability, aligning with our security\\-first and high\\-availability environment.
* Use GitHub for version control, code reviews, and collaborative development workflows.
* Debug and resolve front\\-end and back\\-end issues in WordPress sites and custom web applications.
* Work during standard business hours in the Texas, USA time zone and communicate effectively in English (spoken and written) with team members and, when needed, customers.


**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**
* Strong hands\\-on experience with WordPress, including custom theme and plugin development.
* Proficiency with Avada and Divi themes, including advanced customization and performance optimization.
* Solid knowledge of PHP and MySQL for building and maintaining dynamic, data\\-driven web applications.
* Strong front\\-end skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery, with a focus on responsive and cross\\-browser compatible interfaces.
* Experience using GitHub or similar version control platforms in a collaborative development environment.
* Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented code and follow established coding standards and best practices.
* Excellent English communication skills (reading, writing, and speaking).
* Ability and willingness to work aligned with Texas, USA business hours.
* Strong understanding of web application security fundamentals, including common vulnerabilities such as XSS, CSRF, SQL injection, authentication/authorization flaws, and input validation.
* Experience implementing secure coding practices in PHP, JavaScript, and WordPress (proper escaping/sanitization, prepared statements, secure session handling, password hashing).
* Hands\\-on experience with WordPress security hardening, including managing updates, secure configuration, user roles/permissions, security plugins, and protection against brute\\-force/bot attacks.
* Familiarity with TLS/HTTPS, certificate management concepts, and secure configuration of web servers and reverse proxies at a high level.
* Understanding of cloud security best practices (least\\-privilege IAM, secure storage of secrets, network security groups/firewalls, encryption at rest and in transit).
* Experience working with backups, disaster recovery concepts, and incident response basics (detecting, triaging, and mitigating security or availability incidents).
* Ability to use monitoring and logging tools to detect performance and security issues (error logs, access logs, application monitoring, security alerts)


**Ideal Candidate Profile**
 Technical Competencies
   

  

**Must\\-Have:**
* 3\\+ years of professional WordPress development experience
* Advanced PHP skills (OOP, design patterns, debugging)
* WordPress plugin and theme development from scratch
* Avada and Divi theme customization expertise
* MySQL database design and optimization
* JavaScript/jQuery and front\\-end skills (HTML, CSS)
* Version control (GitHub) in team environments


**Nice\\-to\\-Have:**
* REST API development experience
* Performance optimization and caching strategies
* Hosting environment knowledge (cloud servers, server configurations)
* Experience with continuous integration/deployment tools
* Familiarity with WordPress testing frameworks
* Experience with PHP frameworks such as Laravel, CakePHP, Symfony, or Zend for building scalable web applications
* Hands\\-on experience with Golang, AWS Lambda, and DynamoDB for building and maintaining serverless or event\\-driven services
* Understanding of micro\\-services architecture, including service boundaries, communication patterns, and observability concepts
* Experience with Node.js, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, and Express.js for building modern full\\-stack JavaScript applications
* Familiarity with AI\\-assisted development tools (GitHub Copilot, Cursor, Claude, ChatGPT) and ability to use them responsibly to improve productivity
* Strong grasp of system design principles, SOLID principles, and the full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
* Experience with DevOps practices and tools, including Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or similar)


 Soft Skills \\& Behavioral Traits
   

  

* Communication: Clear, professional English (written and spoken); ability to explain technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders
* Attention to Detail: Writes clean, well\\-documented, maintainable code
* Collaboration: Works well with teams; participates in code reviews and knowledge sharing
* Problem\\-Solving: Proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues
* Time Management: Reliable, meets deadlines, works independently
* Customer Focus: Understands that code serves real users; prioritizes quality and performance
* Continuous Learning: Stays current with WordPress trends, security updates, and best practices


**How to apply for this opportunity?**
* Step 1: Click On Apply! And Register or Login on our portal.
* Step 2: Complete the Screening Form \\& Upload updated Resume
* Step 3: Increase your chances to get shortlisted \\& meet the client for the Interview!


**About Uplers:**
 Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant contractual onsite opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement.
   

  

 (Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).
   

  

 So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

title: Lead Service Now Engineer(7-10 Years)
description:
We are looking for an experienced ServiceNow Lead (Admin cum Developer) with 7\\+ years of hands\\-on expertise in both ServiceNow platform administration and development. The candidate will ensure platform stability, lead enhancements, manage technical delivery, and mentor the team.
 





  
 





 What roles and responsibilities will be performed by the selected candidate?
 



* **Platform Administration**
* Manage daily ServiceNow platform operations and maintenance.
* Perform instance cloning, patching, upgrades, and health checks.
* Administer users, roles, ACLs, and platform security.
* Maintain CMDB, Discovery schedules, and data integrity.
* Monitor system performance and ensure optimal uptime.
* **Development \\& Technical Delivery**
* Design and develop custom applications, workflows, UI policies, UI actions, and catalog items.
* Enhance Service Portal widgets and pages.
* Use Script Includes, Business Rules, and Flow Designer.
* Develop integrations via REST, SOAP, MID Server, and IntegrationHub.
* Understand and implement ITOM licenses for Discover and CMDB management.
* Building Automations for Operational Excellence in ServiceNow
* **Leadership \\& Collaboration**
* Review technical work done by Developers.
* Collaborate with product owners, Architects and process owners for requirements.
* Perform Stakeholder Management with India \\& US teams
* Participate in Agile ceremonies and ensure sprint delivery.
* Provide technical guidance and perform root cause analysis.
* **Governance, Quality \\& Best Practices**
* Ensure compliance with development standards and platform governance.
* Maintain technical documentation.
* Identify automation opportunities and drive improvements.




  
 





  
 





 What is the expectation of the candidate’s current role/profile?
 



* Qualified in B.Tech/M.Tech/BE/ME
* 7\\+ years of combined ServiceNow development and administration experience.
* Proficiency in ITSM modules (Incident, Problem, Change, Request, CMDB).
* Experience with upgrades, cloning, MID Server, Discovery.
* Knowledge of roles, ACLs, data policies, and platform security.
* Understanding of ITIL processes.

title: Senior Application Developer- Devops GCP
description:
**Avant de postuler à un emploi, sélectionnez votre langue de préférence parmi les options disponibles en haut à droite de cette page.**
 Découvrez votre prochaine opportunité au sein d'une organisation qui compte parmi les 500 plus importantes entreprises mondiales. Envisagez des opportunités innovantes, découvrez notre culture enrichissante et travaillez avec des équipes talentueuses qui vous poussent à vous développer chaque jour. Nous savons ce qu’il faut faire pour diriger UPS vers l'avenir : des personnes passionnées dotées d’une combinaison unique de compétences. Si vous avez les qualités, de la motivation, de l'autonomie ou le leadership pour diriger des équipes, il existe des postes adaptés à vos aspirations et à vos compétences d'aujourd'hui et de demain.
   

  

**Fiche De Poste**
 We are seeking a skilled and proactive
 **DevOps Engineer** 
 to join our team. The ideal candidate will have hands\\-on experience with CI/CD pipelines, container orchestration using Kubernetes, and infrastructure monitoring using tools such as Grafana and Prometheus. You will play a key role in automating and optimizing our development and production environments to ensure high availability, scalability, and performance.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines using tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or GitHub Actions.
* Manage and maintain Kubernetes clusters in cloud (e.g., GCP GKE) and/or on\\-prem environments.
* Monitor system performance and availability using Grafana, Prometheus, and other observability tools.
* Automate infrastructure provisioning using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform or Helm.
* Collaborate with development, QA, and operations teams to ensure smooth and reliable software releases.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues in dev, test, and production environments.
* Enforce security and compliance best practices across infrastructure and deployment pipelines.
* Participate in on\\-call rotations and incident response.


**Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent experience).
* 7\\-12 years of experience in a DevOps, Site Reliability Engineering (SRE), or related role.
* Proficient in building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong experience with Kubernetes and containerization (Docker).
* Hands\\-on experience with monitoring and alerting tools such as Grafana, Prometheus, Loki, or ELK Stack.
* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
* Solid scripting skills (e.g., Bash, Python, or Go).
* Familiarity with configuration management tools such as Ansible, Chef, or Puppet is a plus.
* Excellent problem\\-solving and communication skills.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Certifications in Kubernetes (CKA/CKAD) or cloud providers (AWS/GCP/Azure).
* Experience with service mesh technologies (e.g., Istio, Linkerd).
* Familiarity with GitOps practices and tools (e.g., ArgoCD, Flux).


**Type De Contrat**
 en CDI
   

  

*Chez UPS, égalité des chances, traitement équitable et environnement de travail inclusif sont des valeurs clefs auxquelles nous sommes attachés.*

title: Principal Firmware Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
**Family Description**
 Applied R\\&D (AR) consists of target\\-oriented research either with the goal of solving a particular problem / answering a specific question or for multi\\-discipline design, development, and implementation of hardware, software, and systems including maintenance support. Supplies techno\\-economic consulting to clients. AR work is characterised by its detailed and complex nature in order to systematically combine existing knowledge and practices to further developing and incrementally improving products, operational processes, and customer\\-specific feature development.
   

  

**Subfamily Description**
 Integration, Verification \\& Testing (IVT) comprises the integration of SW and / or HW or system components into system, platform, product releases, or networks and verifies the integrated entity or network against particular requirements and specifications. Covers setup and maintenance of laboratory and associated equipment, tools, and devices.
   

  

**How You Will Contribute And What You Will Learn**
 Own and define/participate in end\\-to\\-end validation strategy for coherent pluggable optics and transponder products, ensuring carrier\\-class quality.
   

  

* Act as lead for new product introductions, sustenance releases, and critical customer deployments.
* Drive system\\-level, feature\\-level, and regression test planning aligned with product architecture, standards, and customer use cases.
* Lead and execute complex validation using white\\-box and black\\-box testing across HW, ASIC, FW, and SW layers.
* Provide technical leadership and mentorship to the validation team; establish best practices in test design and execution.
* Collaborate closely with HW, Optical, ASIC, FW, and SW teams to influence design for testability.
* Lead root cause analysis (RCA) of customer\\-found and field issues; enhance test coverage to prevent recurrence.
* Define /participate in the test automation strategy and roadmap, ensuring scalability and long\\-term maintainability.
* Ensure validation readiness, quality metrics, and release sign\\-off with clear risk assessment.


**Key Skills And Experience**
* BS/MS in Engineering with 10\\+ years of experience in validation of optical telecom products.
* Strong domain expertise in Coherent Optics, Transponders, ROADM/DWDM systems, and standards: OTN (G.709\\), Ethernet (100G/400G/800G).
* Proven experience testing carrier\\-grade embedded systems in cross\\-functional and Agile environments.
* Hands\\-on experience with optical test equipment: OSA, Optical Analyzer, Power Meter, VOA, Optical Switch, BER testers.
* Strong Python proficiency: experience with pytest\\-based automation frameworks preferred.
* Experience with test automation, Git, CI/CD integration, defect tracking, and test management tools.
* Demonstrated technical leadership, strong analytical skills, and ability to mentor engineers.
* Experience collaborating with geographically distributed teams.
* Self\\-driven, quality\\-focused, and effective in fast\\-paced product environments.
